name: Flight Fantasy HD Premium
description:
Flight Fantasy HD is a Premium version of the original game. It has absolutely NO ADS, no interruptions, which will let you to focus and enjoy the game even more. Additionally HD version contains requested improvements such as steering and bug fixes.

Immerse yourself into Flight Fantasy HD and teleport to magical, dream-like place, full of color and wonder.

Flight Fantasy HD is an adventure simulator, where you collect blobs of energy. The game has a very relaxing atmosphere. Play whenever you want to escape from real life problems, at least for a bit.

Features:

Touch controls specifically designed for mobile
Virtual joystick / tilt / gyroscope
Airplane Controller
Awesome visual style, stylish
Great, dream like music and sound effects
Different planes
Levels: no time and fuel running out

Don't miss this wonderful experience. Play now!
